Faroese: Nú hava vit 4 mánaðar gamlar mýs, sum ikki hava sukursjúku, sum fyrr høvdu sukursjúku,” legði hann afturat.
English: Now we have 4-month-old mice that do not have diabetes, which previously had diabetes,” he added.

Faroese: Doktari Ehud Ur, professari í læknavísindi á Dalhousie fróðskaparsetri í Halifax, Nova Scotia og formaður fyri klinisku og vísindaligu deildina í kanadiska sukursjúku-felagsskapinum ávaraði um, at granskingin enn er tíðliga í tilgongdini.
English: Doctor Ehud Ur, professor of medical science at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chairman of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association, warned that the research is still in the early stages of development.
